SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VkCuLaunchInfoNVX

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkCuLaunchInfoNVX
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class VkCuLaunchInfoNVX extends Struct implements NativeResource
Stub description of VkCuLaunchInfoNVX.
Valid Usage (Implicit)
  • sType must be STRUCTURE_TYPE_CU_LAUNCH_INFO_NVX
  • pNext must be NULL
  • function must be a valid VkCuFunctionNVX handle
  • If paramCount is not 0, pParams must be a valid pointer to an array of paramCount bytes
  • If extraCount is not 0, pExtras must be a valid pointer to an array of extraCount bytes
See Also

CmdCuLaunchKernelNVX

Layout


 struct VkCuLaunchInfoNVX {
     VkStructureType sType;
     void const * pNext;
     VkCuFunctionNVX function;
     uint32_t gridDimX;
     uint32_t gridDimY;
     uint32_t gridDimZ;
     uint32_t blockDimX;
     uint32_t blockDimY;
     uint32_t blockDimZ;
     uint32_t sharedMemBytes;
     size_t paramCount;
     void const * const * pParams;
     size_t extraCount;
     void const * const * pExtras;
 }

    • VkCuLaunchInfoNVX

      public VkCuLaunchInfoNVX(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a VkCuLaunchInfoNVX instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
